channel.title: Bursting
channel.description: [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/6734/burstinguu6.png[/img] bursting, comment and rate pls? basic smudging and stuff and brushes, only one c4d??? if you pay atteion to my sigs i used like 20 =/ trying to brake a few habits, any ways please rate and comment (or comment and rate lul)

item.title: Bursting
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

The orange text is a bit too pale for me. Make it a richer, bolder orange.

The background doesn’t look that good either but i like the white stuff coming off your sprite… looks very cool!

Read full topic

item.title: Bursting
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Would’ve been better if you didn’t have dragonite…

@tedyslilnoob wrote:

yeah no offence, your other stuff was so much better - bu ti coudlnt do any better

item.title: Bursting
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:4, topic:135081”][quote author=killerman93 link=topic=186521.msg1686630#msg1686630 date=1187582939]
Hmm, ok, this is hard to rate.
I have to say for someone of your level at GFX, it isnt the best.
I dont like the fact that it has no colour, the render dosnt fit if you’re trying to make it look evilish lol.
Overall 4-5/10.
Definitely not one of my favourite sigs by you I have to say.
[/quote]
i to lazy to make the mist and stuff orange =/ it could of been alot better but i wasnt really in the moood[/quote]

You werent in the mood to make it look good?..Thats very interesting.

Not one of your best,lacking color,but still I like the look of it. 6/10

Read full topic
